name: Misumi Whitening Body Lotion
description: Formulated with a botanical blend of skin brightening ingredients including natural Japanese sakura & mulberry, nourishing vitamin B3 and vitamin C, and hydrating natural oils, this body lotion brightens, moisturises and nourishes skin for a beautiful complexion for your whole body. With sunscreen protection. No harmful or toxic chemicals used. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
